7 from niryo_robot_sound.srv import PlaySound, PlaySoundRequest
8 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import SetInt, Trigger
9 from niryo_robot_sound.srv import ManageSound, ManageSoundRequest
10 from niryo_robot_sound.srv import TextToSpeech

12 # Command Status
13 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
14 from std_msgs.msg import String

17 class SoundRosWrapperException(Exception):
18  pass
19 
20 
21 def check_ned2_version(func):
22  """
23  Decorator that check the robot version
24  """
25 
26  def wrap(*args, **kwargs):
27  robot_instance = args[0]
28  if robot_instance.hardware_version not in ['ned2', 'ned3pro']:
29  raise SoundRosWrapperException(
30  "Error Code : {}\nMessage : Wrong robot hardware version, feature only available on Ned2".format(
31  CommandStatus.BAD_HARDWARE_VERSION))
32 
33  return func(*args, **kwargs)
34 
35  return wrap
36 
37 
38 class SoundRosWrapper(object):
39 
40  def __init__(self, hardware_version='ned2', service_timeout=1):
41  self.__service_timeout = service_timeout
42  self.__hardware_version = hardware_version
43 
44  self.__sounds = []
45  self.__sound_duration = {}
46  self.__current_sound = ''
47  if hardware_version in ['ned2', 'ned3pro']:
48  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_sound/sound_database', SoundList, self.__sound_database_callback)
49  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_sound/sound', String, self.__sound_callback)
50 
51  @property
52  def hardware_version(self):
53  return self.__hardware_version
54 
55  def __check_ned_2_version(self):
56  if self.__hardware_version not in ['ned2', 'ned3pro']:
57  raise SoundRosWrapperException(
58  "Error Code : {}\nMessage : Wrong robot hardware version, feature only available on Ned2".format(
59  CommandStatus.BAD_HARDWARE_VERSION))
60 
61  @property
62  def sounds(self):
63  """
64  Get sound name list
65 
66  :return: list of the sounds of the robot
67  :rtype: list[string]
68  """
69  return self.__sounds
70 
71  @property
72  def current_sound(self):
73  """
74  Get the current sound being played
75 
76  :return: current sound name
77  :rtype: Optional[str]
78  """
79  return self.__current_sound or None
80 
81  def __sound_database_callback(self, msg):
82  self.__sound_duration = {sound.name: sound.duration for sound in msg.sounds}
83  self.__sounds = list(self.__sound_duration.keys())
84 
85  def __sound_callback(self, msg):
86  self.__current_sound = msg.data
87 
88  # @check_ned2_version
89  def play(self, sound_name, wait_end=True, start_time_sec=0, end_time_sec=0):
90  """
91  Play a sound from the robot
92  If failed, raise NiryoRosWrapperException
93 
94  :param sound_name: Name of the sound to play
95  :type sound_name: str
96  :param start_time_sec: start the sound from this value in seconds
97  :type start_time_sec: float
98  :param end_time_sec: end the sound at this value in seconds
99  :type end_time_sec: float
100  :param wait_end: wait for the end of the sound before exiting the function
101  :type wait_end: bool
102  :return: status, message
103  :rtype: (int, str)
104  """
105  self.__check_ned_2_version()
106  result = self.__call_service(
107  '/niryo_robot_sound/play',
108  PlaySound,
109  PlaySoundRequest(sound_name=sound_name,
110  start_time_sec=start_time_sec,
111  end_time_sec=end_time_sec,
112  wait_end=wait_end))
113  rospy.sleep(0.1)
114  return self.__classic_return_w_check(result)
115 
116  # @check_ned2_version
117  def set_volume(self, sound_volume):
118  """
119  Set the volume percentage of the robot.
120  If failed, raise NiryoRosWrapperException
121 
122  :param sound_volume: volume percentage of the sound (0: no sound, 100: max sound)
123  :type sound_volume: int
124  :return: status, message
125  :rtype: (int, str)
126  """
127  self.__check_ned_2_version()
128  result = self.__call_service('/niryo_robot_sound/set_volume', SetInt, sound_volume)
129  rospy.sleep(0.1)
130  return self.__classic_return_w_check(result)
131 
132  # @check_ned2_version
133  def stop(self):
134  """
135  Stop a sound being played.
136  If failed, raise NiryoRosWrapperException
137 
138  :return: status, message
139  :rtype: (int, str)
140  """
141  self.__check_ned_2_version()
142  result = self.__call_service('/niryo_robot_sound/stop', Trigger)
143  rospy.sleep(0.1)
144  return self.__classic_return_w_check(result)
145 
146  # @check_ned2_version
147  def delete_sound(self, sound_name):
148  """
149  Delete a sound on the RaspberryPi of the robot.
150  If failed, raise NiryoRosWrapperException
151 
152  :param sound_name: name of the sound which needs to be deleted
153  :type sound_name: str
154  :return: status, message
155  :rtype: (int, str)
156  """
157  self.__check_ned_2_version()
158  req = ManageSoundRequest(sound_name=sound_name, action=ManageSoundRequest.DELETE)
159  result = self.__call_service('/niryo_robot_sound/manage', ManageSound, req)
160  return self.__classic_return_w_check(result)
161 
162  # @check_ned2_version
163  def import_sound(self, sound_name, sound_data):
164  """
165  Delete a sound on the RaspberryPi of the robot.
166  If failed, raise NiryoRosWrapperException
167 
168  :param sound_name: name of the sound which needs to be deleted
169  :type sound_name: str
170  :param sound_data: String containing the encoded data of the sound file (wav or mp3)
171  :type sound_data: str
172  :return: status, message
173  :rtype: (int, str)
174  """
175  self.__check_ned_2_version()
176 
177  import base64
178 
179  sound_data_b64 = base64.b64encode(sound_data)
180  req = ManageSoundRequest(sound_name=sound_name, action=ManageSoundRequest.DELETE, sound_data=sound_data_b64)
181  result = self.__call_service('/niryo_robot_sound/send_sound', ManageSound, req)
182  return self.__classic_return_w_check(result)
183 
184  # @check_ned2_version
185  def get_sound_duration(self, sound_name):
186  """
187  Returns the duration in seconds of a sound stored in the robot database
188  raise SoundRosWrapperException if the sound doesn't exists
189 
190  :param sound_name: name of sound
191  :type sound_name: str
192  :return: sound duration in seconds
193  :rtype: float
194  """
195  self.__check_ned_2_version()
196  if sound_name not in self.__sound_duration:
197  raise SoundRosWrapperException("Sound name: {} not found".format(sound_name))
198 
199  return self.__sound_duration[sound_name]
200 
201  # @check_ned2_version
202  def say(self, text, language=0):
203  """
204  Use gtts (Google Text To Speech) to interpret a string as sound
205  Languages available are:
206  - English: 0
207  - French: 1
208  - Spanish: 2
209  - Mandarin: 3
210  - Portuguese: 4
211 
212 
213  :param text: text to speek < 100 char
214  :type text: string
215  :param language: language of the text
216  :type language: int
217  :return: status, message
218  :rtype: (int, str)
219  """
220  self.__check_ned_2_version()
221  result = self.__call_service('/niryo_robot_sound/text_to_speech', TextToSpeech, text, language)
222 
223  if not result.success:
224  raise SoundRosWrapperException("Message : {}".format(result.message))
225 
226  return result.success, result.message
227 
228  # --- Functions interface
229  def __call_service(self, service_name, service_msg_type, *args):
230  """
231  Wait for the service called service_name
232  Then call the service with args
233 
234  :param service_name:
235  :param service_msg_type:
236  :param args: Tuple of arguments
237  :raises NiryoRosWrapperException: Timeout during waiting of services
238  :return: Response
239  """
240  # Connect to service
241  try:
242  rospy.wait_for_service(service_name, self.__service_timeout)
243  except rospy.ROSException as e:
244  raise SoundRosWrapperException(e)
245 
246  # Call service
247  try:
248  service = rospy.ServiceProxy(service_name, service_msg_type)
249  response = service(*args)
250  return response
251  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
252  raise SoundRosWrapperException(e)
253 
254  def __classic_return_w_check(self, result):
255  self.__check_result_status(result)
256  return result.status, result.message
257 
258  @staticmethod
259  def __check_result_status(result):
260  if result.status < 0:
261  raise SoundRosWrapperException("Error Code : {}\nMessage : {}".format(result.status, result.message))
